title: Ashampoo WinOptimizer v11.00.41 Incl Reg [TorDigger]
description:
Ashampoo WinOptimizer

Ashampoo WinOptimizer new 11th line software package that allows to optimize the operating system due to its setting and cleaning. It includes utilities to clean the hard disk and system registry, the module for the protection of personal information by searching for and deleting files and data left behind by Internet surfing. 

Also has a tool for optimizing the Internet - Connection module for configuring software autoloading coincide with the launch of the system, as well as modules for searching and removing unnecessary faylov DLL, to permanently remove data and to encrypt files. 

In addition, the program allows to override the file associations, encrypt and decrypt files, and permanently delete them. Finally, it is possible to configure your system and its optimization for a single click. In the 11th version has many new features, new modules, including a new anti-spyware module and manager context menu Windows, as well as many improvements and bug fixes.
